front.title: Core Based Trees (CBT) Multicast Routing MIB

abstract.t: This memo defines an experimental portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. More precisely, it describes managed objects specific to the Core Based Trees (CBT) multicast routing protocol version 2 [5]. Managed objects which are common to all multicast routing protocols, including CBT, can be found in [6]. This MIB module is applicable to IP multicast routers which implement CBTv2.
